creditline: Gift of Mrs. C. Ward Clarke
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: a (bell) frieze around top two dragons and a moon; three part inscription around half of outside at top; four character inscription on top edge above middle of right dragon.

title: Temple bell with leather covered hammer
